document_data.name: Bock
document_data.mainbody: '''Bock''' was the Guildmaster of the [[Purple Masks Guild]] , a thieves' guild located in [[Iriaebor]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: He was an enormous man with several chins, dressed in maroon and silver silk, with a pudgy ring-covered hand.
document_data.Personality: Despite his appearance, he was an intelligent man.
document_data.Relationships: By the early 1360s, Bock had been asking [[Jewel Talondim|Jewel]], the head of an independent thief family, to marry him for at least twenty years; she kept saying maybe.
document_data.History: In [[1363 DR]], he helped the [[Fellowship of the Dreaming Dragon]] get information about [[Ravendas]],<ref> and he also helped them get into the dungeons of the [[High Tower of Iriaebor]] to try and free prisoners that Ravendas was holding captive.<ref>
